00020         {
00021             while(!events.empty()) {
00022                 pendingEvent = events.front();
00023                 events.pop();
00024                 delete pendingEvent;
00025             }

00044         void EntityEventManager::collision(Entity *entity1, Entity *entity2)
00045         {
00046             events.push(new EntityEvent(entity1, "collision", entity2));
00047             events.push(new EntityEvent(entity2, "collision", entity1));
00048         }

00071         {
00072             events.push(new EntityEvent(entity, "property", 0, key));
00073         }
00074 
00075         void EntityEventManager::flush()
00076         {
00077             while(!events.empty()) {
00078                 pendingEvent = events.front();
00079                 scriptManager->runScript(
00080                         pendingEvent->getSource()->getScript());
00081                 events.pop();
00082                 delete pendingEvent;
00083             }
00084         }
00085     }
00086 }
